attributes.action: reduce the damage being done to the nation in the name of political correctness.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The damage can be substantially reduced by:-
1) reducing or eliminating the amount of money paid to those claiming compensation in the name of political correctness.
2) punishing those who make frivolous or spurious compensation claims in the name of political correctness. 
3) preventing the media from fanning the flames of social unrest with screaming headlines every time a misguided bureaucrat introduces some ridiculous PC initiative which all reasonable people, regardless of race, creed, sex, religion etc. would consider to be absurd. 
4) ensuring that bureaucrats aren’t able to abuse their position by introducing absurd PC initiatives. 
5) the media having to issue front-page apologies to the public and be heavily fined every time they print or utter a single word that is untrue.
